newsitem.title: USA: Eagle preferred Motorola/Time Warner carrier.
newsitem.headline: Eagle preferred Motorola/Time Warner carrier.

text.p: Eagle USA Airfreight said Wednesday it has been named an approved carrier of domestic heavyweight air freight for Motorola, Inc, and Time Warner, Inc.
Eagle USA said in a statement that it is the first air freight forwarder ever selected by Motorola as a preferred carrier.

The air freight forwarder also said it has been designated as the preferred carrier for the entertainment and publishing conglomerate, Time Warner. The company said it began servicing the general commodity air freight needs of Time Warner this year, and in September Eagle USA was awarded a one-year contract as a preferred carrier.
Though primarily a domestic forwarder, Eagle USA is in the throes of expanding its international operations. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542-7706 Fax+44 171 542-5017
